resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104408</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104408</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204337</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Adding Support and Detail Without Getting Arrested!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Support und Detail hinzufügen, ohne festgehalten 
zu erhalten!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ajoutant le support et le détail sans obtenir 
arrêté !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Adicionando a sustentação e o detalhe sem 
começar prendido!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aggiungendo supporto e particolare senza ottenere 
arrestato!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσθέτοντας την υποστήριξη και τη λεπτομέρεια χωρίς 
να πάρει συλλήφθείτε!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Agregando la ayuda y el detalle sin conseguir 
arrestado!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson plan is designed to teach students the concept of using facts to support ideas and to interpret (elaborate on) those facts in order to create a synthesized paragraph.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Lektionplan ist konzipiert, um Kursteilnehmern das 
Konzept des Verwendens von von Tatsachen beizubringen, um Ideen zu 
unterstützen und (arbeitn Sie an), jene aus Tatsachen zu deuten, um 
einen synthetisierten Paragraphen zu erstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce plan de leçon est conçu pour enseigner à des 
étudiants le concept d'employer des faits pour supporter des idées 
et pour interpréter (élaborez en fonction) ces faits afin de créer 
un paragraphe synthétisé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta planta da lição é projetada ensinar a estudantes o
conceito de usar fatos suportar idéias e interpretar (elabore sobre) 
aqueles fatos a fim criar um parágrafo synthesized.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo programma di lezione è destinato per insegnare ad 
allievi il concetto di usando i fatti per sostenere le idee e per 
interpretare (elabori sopra) quei fatti per creare un paragrafo 
sintetizzato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το σχέδιο μαθήματος σχεδιάζεται για να διδάξει 
στους σπουδαστές την έννοια της χρησιμοποίησης των γεγονότων στις 
ιδέες υποστήριξης και για να ερμηνεύσει (διαμορφώστε) εκείνα τα 
γεγονότα προκειμένου να δημιουργηθεί μια συντεθειμένη παράγραφος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este plan de la lección se diseña para enseñar a 
estudiantes el concepto de usar hechos para utilizar ideas y para 
interpretar (elabore encendido) esos hechos para crear un párrafo 
sintetizado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:BONNIE MCMURRAY
FN:BONNIE MCMURRAY
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:JULIE JOSLIN
FN:JULIE JOSLIN
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204337</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104408</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/adding-support-and-detail-without-getting-arrested</uri>

  </manifestation>
